usage.cn: 知足是人生在世最大的幸事。——爱迪生
usage.eng: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.

usage.cn: 在这充满温馨的季节里，给你我真挚的祝福及深深的思念
usage.eng: In such a soft and warm season, please accept my sincere blessing and deep concern for you.

usage.cn: 一份不渝的友谊，执着千万个祝福，给我想念的朋友，温馨的问候。
usage.eng: For our ever-lasting friendship, send sincere blessings and warm greetings to my friends whom I miss so much.
